description:
Colombia’s prosecution accidentally torpedoed its attempts to block investigations into former President Alvaro Uribe’s ties to the now-defunct paramilitary organization AUC. Prosecutor Gilberto Villareal summoned Mancuso to help shelve an…

The post How Colombia’s prosecution got Uribe in even deeper legal trouble appeared first on Colombia News | Colombia Reports.
title: How Colombia’s prosecution got Uribe in even deeper legal trouble
